title: Receipts 1.9.15b2 – Enhance your incoming invoice management
content: Receipts offers smart document and invoice collection.   Features Recognize: Receipts recognizes gross invoice amount, slip date, declared sales tax, currency, and bank account details automatically and, thus enables the busy user to speed up his receipts management. title: QuickLinks 2.7 – Shortcut commands for any file

title: CarManager 1.42 – Manage your car-related activities
content: CarManager lets you easily and conveniently manage your automobile-related operations and activities in one unified interface.   Version 1.42: Fix some bugs   Intel, 64-bit processor macOS 10.14 or later

title: Auto Highlight 4.2 – helps you see what’s important
content: Auto Highlight will automatically highlight defined words on defined pages.   Why? title: FinalShot 2.1 – Take screenshots with ease
content: FinalShot locates itself in your menu bar, and it’s always there when you need it – 2 clicks, and your screenshot is taken! title: Integrity Pro 12.3.3 – Easily find your website’s broken links
content: Integrity Pro builds on Integrity Plus. It has the new v8 crawling engine, it checks links and generates a sitemap with all the searching, filtering and exporting functionality of the Plus version.
